White Box QA Engineer (groundbreaking online advertising startup)
Fremont, CA

Offerpal Media is the first Managed Offer Platform for social applications, online communities, and e-commerce sites. Our turnkey platform allows developers of social applications on leading networks (such as Facebook, MySpace, Bebo, hi5, and others) to monetize their traffic through uniquely engineered offers. Concurrently, advertisers tap into Offerpals expansive network to reach more than 50 million highly engaged and targeted consumers on social networks. The platform also helps online merchants generate incremental revenue by using ad offers as an alternate payment method. With headquarters in the heart of Silicon Valley, Offerpal Media is backed by top-tier venture capitalists and features an experienced management team with deep roots in online advertising, personalization, and optimization technologies.

Role and Responsibilities

Our engineers have experience and expertise in building and deploying large scale distributed applications and Web-scale optimization technologies. We are searching to find a stellar White Box QA Engineer to join the team. The ideal engineering guru for this role has exceptionally strong computer science fundamentals, an active capacity to learn, relevant experience in Web-scale development, and strong emotional intelligence.

We value a love of elegant code and the personal flexibility and enthusiasm to wear the many hats needed in a startup. We need someone with raw intelligence and innate curiosity to seek out the answers to problems when they arise, rather than idle in neutral. Above all, we hire engineers who love being engineers. The main responsibilities of this role will be

Help conceptualize, implement and execute back-end test scripts for maintenance and new feature releases
Work with the Automation Lead to design test strategies, develop test tools and implement test scripts to ensure the highest quality of deliverables
Will work closely with Engineering to understand the Product Architecture and assist with Unit Testing
Work on identifying, designing or enhancing existing test frameworks to support back-end test development
Build and maintain automation framework and a comprehensive suite of tests and tools to track the performance and scalability of all Offerpal products, and
Work with development teams to fix regressions bugs.

Professional Experience and Personal Qualities

Experience in/with
- API test automation
- Creating back-end test frameworks
- Unit Testing and code coverage tools
- UNIX and shell scripting
Familiarity with Continuous Integration concepts
Strong understanding of QA Processes
Strong knowledge of multi-tier web platforms and concepts
Strong object-oriented programming skills such as Java, C++
Strong knowledge in at least one scripting language such as Perl
Strong understanding of relational databases, MySQL preferred
Ability to work independently to triage issues and prioritize tasks
Strong communication skills (verbal and written)
Well organized, with strong attention to detail with strong analytical and problem-solving skills
We need a self-starter, someone who manages multiple projects simultaneously and drives to completion
Flexibility, resourcefulness, and the ability to thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment

About Offerpal Media

Offerpal Media provides innovative online consumer acquisition services on a pay-for-performance basis. We enable online merchants and advertisers to grow revenue, acquire quality customers, and maximize brand reach through blogs, Websites, and social networks.

Our turn-key, full-service platform enables publishers to monetize their social applications; online merchants to generate new leads and increase conversions; and advertisers to reach their precisely targeted consumers. We have one of the largest networks of premium advertisers and more than 500 uniquely engineered offers. Offerpal Media is a fast-growing startup founded by successful serial entrepreneurs and funded by top-tier venture capital firms D.E. Shaw Investors, Interwest Capital and Northbridge Venture Partners. For more information, visit www.offerpalmedia.com.

Qualified and Interested Candidates

If this position sounds like a fit with your past experience and future interests -- and you want to be part of the excitement of a rapidly growing business -- we want to hear from you. We have a competitive compensation structure with a generous option plan and very good benefits. Please send a resume to careers@offerpal.com.

Read our blog: http://myofferpal.wordpress.com
Follow our Tweets: http://www.twitter.com/Offerpal
